thread.title: Mark
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text: I needed an oiled bronze faucet for my under - sink filtration system. I researched many faucets - many which carried the California warning that stated the faucet contained materials known to cause cancer (unbelievable that a faucet for filtered water could be made from hazardous materials!). The pelican faucet is certified by NSA to be safe - which sold me immediately!! Great customer service!!
